name: Python 3 with Manual Chrome Install and SSH
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget gnupg && wget -q -O - https://dl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/google-chrome.gpg && sudo sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/google-chrome.gpg] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list' && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable && pip install -r requirements.txt
